review.title: Nice hotel close to airport
review.reviewText: Clerk at check-in was great.  Young asian guy checked us in and told us a good place to eat.  Very nice.  Room was good.  No issues.  Was told we could get shuttle to airport at 4 am. We took our rental back so we could Dave time in the morning.  Shuttle driver was 20 minutes late. Almost missed our flight.  Only bad comment about this hotel.    Tried to get my Hilton Honors point said no because I booked thru Expedia.

review.title: Nice Stay
review.reviewText: This hotel is a little difficult to find and to get to, but this is due to the construction happening on hyw 101.  The hotel itself, however, was and is an island of refinement in the arena of confusion.  The staff went above and beyond to extend all courtesy and hospitality without being smothering.  The room was better than described, clean and orderly, with many extras that were complimentary.  The breakfast was delicious, well stocked and maintained, with plenty of food and choices.
review.negativeRemarks: The elevator should be inspected for possible mechanical issues.  It was a scary ride, the only negative of the stay.
review.locationRemarks: The hotel is located at the San Francisco airport (SFO) and is within easy driving distance of all the attractions of the San Francisco bay area.

review.title: Terrible bed!  Room wasn't ready at check in!
review.reviewText: Miserable night, need a chiropractor now!  Room was ok, but bed was terrible!  Room temperature was difficult to control, either too hot or cold!

review.title: Overnight stay by the airport
review.reviewText: We got in late and had a very early flight.  The staff was friendly.  The robot that brought up 2 waters to our room was really neat.  The room was nice, the temperature was easy to control, the bathroom and bed were fine.  Overall, I'd go back there and stay if I had an early flight out.  The hotel shuttle was ready for us and left on time.  Unfortunately, we left before breakfast was ready.
review.positiveRemarks: The location was great to get to an early flight.
review.negativeRemarks: Could have used at least one more towel in the bathroom for my wife and I.

review.title: Close to Airport and BART
review.reviewText: First time I stayed here. Staff was helpful and efficient. Will be back.

review.title: Great location
review.reviewText: We were in san fran for a bitter sweet event however your amesome staff made the stay amazing..thanks

review.title: Nice hotel near SF Airport
review.reviewText: Stayed for 2 nights on weekend with family. Good comparative rates with nice amenities like mini refrigerator and microwave in a room, complementary breakfast with free parking.

review.title: Horrible beds
review.reviewText: Our room was by the elevator and we could hear the door opening and closing all night long. The beds were really bad. We put the comforter on the bottom to help with the mattress. Next time I will stay elsewhere.

review.title: Convenient to our destination
review.reviewText: East to find off the 101.  Parking could be better.

review.title: Renovations in progress.
review.reviewText: We enjoyed our stay, but we were not aware that renovations were under way.  The elevator was not working, though fortunately (or unfortunately) we were on the first floor in a handicapped room (none of us were handicapped), so at least we did not have to climb stairs.  The breakfast was great, and I am sure the facilities will be wonderful when the renovations are complete.  Because we were on the first floor, we did not have any kind of view, which would have been nice as the motel is near the water.
review.positiveRemarks: The location, price and shuttle to the airport were wonderful.  The free breakfast was probably the best I have had.  The free parking was a bonus.
review.negativeRemarks: A working elevator and completion of renovations.

review.title: Close to airport and other business establishments
review.reviewText: Nice, comfortable hotel. However, they are doing construction right now so depending on the room, there may be some noise. I would not recommend staying on the first floor either. The continental breakfast was good, very fresh and convenient as well. My husband and I had it once. The hotel also provides a shuttle to the airport of needed.

I had stayed at a different Hotel the night before. A well known hotel in every state but cheaper in cost (and known to be cheap) so my expectation of that hotel vs. the Hampton Inn was lesser of the two since The Hampton Inn is by Hilton Inn & Suites. Well I was very disappointed to find that the room at the Hampton Inn was much smaller, the bathroom was way smaller, the bed wasn't as comfortable, the breakfast wasn't all that great, the staff at breakfast don't smile at you and they had staff on their hands and knees cleaning the floors by the elevators with a small brush in hand. I thought it was a safety issue since it was during check out time (11am) so the floors were wet, we had to walk around staff on their knees and try not to slip and fall and I thought it was belittling to staff. If that's the protocol for cleaning floors at The Hampton Inn then it should be done during sleep hours so that you don't place customer's at risk.
review.positiveRemarks: There was nothing extra ordinary about it to stand out above any other.
review.negativeRemarks: Friendlier staff, don't wet the floors during check out time, better breakfast options and since the rooms and bathrooms are small, lower the price!

review.title: Visiting daughter
review.reviewText: Under remodeling at the time we stayed but it was still nice .

review.title: Comfortable and convenient
review.reviewText: We just needed a place to stay in the area while we were visiting friends.  It was very comfortable. There were extra touches by the staff that made us feel welcome and appreciated.  Breakfast was a pleasant surprise.  I have the hotel in my "places to stay" folder.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean.  In a safe area so we could walk to restaurants. Great service.
review.negativeRemarks: They were in the process of upgrading.  Can't wait til they're done.
review.locationRemarks: We visited friends but it's close to a wonderful park, golf and a walking trail along the bay.  And, of course, it's near to San Francisco.

review.title: Great experience!
review.reviewText: The hotel is conveniently located near the airport, making it easy to take the BART into the city and return for an easy stay overnight. Much more reasonable than trying to find anything decent downtown. We were definitely stay here again!

review.title: Unexpected!
review.reviewText: Staff was very friendly and our room was very clean and comfortable.  It looked like it was newly refurbished.  The bathroom was well stocked with bath supplies and the towels smelled like they were just freshly laundered! An added plus was the the great drainage in the shower! We've stayed in 5 star hotels where the shower drain is clogged up and this riles me to no end!   The bed was firm and very comfortable, the linen smelled fresh and clean. The only complaint I have is the hallway outside our room.  During our entire stay, I don't believe they vacuumed the carpet; the same small pieces of paper strewn on the carpet was still there when we checked out! Overall, for one who favors staying at the nearby Westin whenever we travel this area, I would definitely stay in this hotel again!

review.title: Convenient comfortable airport hotel
review.reviewText: Good convenient airport hotel... comfortable room... easy check-in and check-out... good shuttle service to airport

review.title: As Expected
review.reviewText: The hotel was clean, beds OK.   There was not a heavy drape on the window for total security (darkness) which was my only compliant.    Breakfast was good with basic choices available.    Only one Bus to SFO, which left every half hour, which means that you get picked up at airport only every half hour.   Most hotels has a more frequent schedule.
review.positiveRemarks: Breakfast
review.negativeRemarks: More timely transportation to airport.

review.title: Nice hotel near airport.
review.reviewText:
Free shuttle every 30 min. Nice comfortable room, clean bedding. Complimentary water bottles in the room. Free continental hot breakfast. 
Very nice and helpful staff

review.title: Ice cold
review.reviewText:
Check in was OK... kind service... but room was horrible!   Ice cold (set at 65).... no water.... bathroom is laid out like a gym.... tons of space in the center... but no space on sink...- almost like a special needs room... but it was not.  

Breakfast is served only after 6am...  not very buisness savvy... nor friendly to early flights.   

No vending (that I could find)...

Nothing good to say...
review.positiveRemarks: nothing
review.negativeRemarks: remodel the rooms and bathrooms... have vending machines... serve breakfast starting at 5am... and stock water (like the amenities states)
review.locationRemarks: Near Airport

review.title: Nice hotel but it seems like the staff isnt well t
review.reviewText:
Stayed for one night.  Front desk check in was pleasant and efficient.  Got to the room and was greeted with a sign saying, "Enjoy complimentary bottled water".  However, there was no water at all.  I wouldn't have expected it if the sign wasn't there, but if they say they are giving me something, then they should have it there.  Perhaps a problem with the housekeeping staff.  

In the morning, we arrived for breakfast only to find the hot items were out.  The person filling them appeared to be filling them but after waiting there for some time with no food forthcoming, we asked her if she was filling them.  She snapped at us in a rude way that "they are coming" as if we were bothering her by even asking if more would be coming out.   It was kind of surprising coming from someone in the entertainment industry.  She saw us waiting there and it was obvious what we were waiting for.  She should have at least acknowledged that she was filling them without us asking.  And then, to be answered in such a rude way was kind of disappointing.  

Overall it was a fine stay but we were definitely taken aback by that.
review.positiveRemarks: The rooms were updated and clean.  Beds were comfy.  Very quiet rooms.
review.negativeRemarks: Training for staff other than front desk staff.

review.title: Very happy with my stay
review.reviewText: This hotel provided even more than I expected. Wonderful breakfast.
Pretty good. The room is clean and spacious. Close to the SFO airport.

review.title: Return of forgotten Items..thank you
review.reviewText: Thank you Hampton Inn for returning my mother and Aunts coats to us, prior to them departing for Canada, they were so happy to have them returned to quickly. This has left such a favorable opinion of your Hotel and the kindness of your staff.
review.negativeRemarks: Maybe silver ware vs. plastic cutlery?
review.locationRemarks: A bit disconcerting to see so may rat-traps along the pathway toward the Japanese restaurant.SCARY!!!!

review.reviewText: very near to SFO airport and free shuttle every 30 mins. hotel is next to the shore, nice view!
Good location to airport and shuttle was right on time.

review.title: Nice Hotel near the Airport
review.reviewText: Although we arrived late in the evening, the front desk clerk was most helpful with an easy checkin and with excellent restaurant recommendations. Although I had a number of questions, the desk clerk was very patient and willing to help. Excellent breakfast and staff. Only complaint was the bed was a bit firm for my tastes, but it was bearable.

review.title: nice hotel
review.reviewText: Hotel is very good. Breakfast is better than expected but the room price is little bit expensive since it is 10 miles from SF.

review.title: Convenient Hotel for the Airport
review.reviewText: I stayed here on 2015-09-06 with the family as we had an early flight out of SFO the following day and I did not want to risk delays due to traffic by staying in a downtown hotel. The rooms are very clean and the hotel has a good breakfast selection. Complementary shuttle to the airport that took only 5 minutes was handy so I could save time by dropping off the rental car the night before we flew. There are not too many restaurants in the area so eat before you get there although the front desk had the phone number of a good place nearby that  delivered food that was both hot and good to our room. If all you want is somewhere to sleep before you had off elsewhere its as good as anything you'll find.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean & only 5 mins from SFO Airport
review.locationRemarks: Close to SFO - its really an airport hotel.

review.title: Nice hotel close to SFO
review.reviewText: This hotel is close to San Francisco International Airport and very convenient for air travelers. The hotel offers us nice continental breakfast early in the morning and shuttle bus service to the airport every 30 minutes by day and night.The lobby and the guest rooms are very clean and comfortable. This hotel is highly recommended especially to business travelers.

review.title: Quick stay
review.reviewText: We booked it at 8 that night and checked in late about midnight staff was nice.
review.positiveRemarks: Room was clean
review.negativeRemarks: Jacuzzi
review.locationRemarks: Good dinner 10mins away

review.title: Excellent for what you get
review.reviewText:
-Fast, friendly check in
-free parking
-hot breakfast buffet exceeded expectations with maple kielbasa style sausage, scrambled eggs with ham and cheddar, make your own waffle station, and all the usual continental breakfast options
-guests were quiet, could only hear footsteps at random times. Probably people headed to airport
- walking path across the street great for exercise and watching planes land/take off (the kids loved this)

review.title: Everything was great except the breakfast
review.reviewText: Room was great, breakfast was very disappointing. Eggs ham and cheese all tasted fake and gross. Fake creamer for coffee, no milk. Other than that the room was nice, had everything, comfy bed.

review.title: Close to airport.
review.reviewText: Very slow elevator. Only one elevator to serve entire hotel. If someone hogs the elevator without being mindful of others in the hotel, guests have to wait, sometimes as long as 5 minutes before the elevator becomes free. The elevator itself is painstakingly slow. Stairs are nowhere in sight to use.

Staff was exceptional.  Rooms were perfect and housekeeping service was exceptional. The hotel is far enough away from the big city confusion of San Francisco, but close enough, by car, to get to any and all major attractions and sites of interest.  Well worth the stay.

review.title: Nice room and close to the airport.
review.reviewText: Very nice room. Only complaint is the exclusive use of plastic cups and utensils in the room and at breakfast. Cheapens the experience.

review.title: Great Location outside San Francisco
review.reviewText:
Family vacation to San Francisco:  I picked this hotel based on price, free parking, and free breakfast.  When reviewing hotels to stay at in San Francisco, it was difficult to find a reasonably priced hotel for two adults and three children.  Most charged for parking (would cost an additional $200 for our stay), additional guests ($60 for four days), and I would still have to find a breakfast location each day ($80-$100 more during our stay).  

This Hampton Inn location is about three minutes from Hwy 101 and the Milbrae BART Station.  During our stay, I drove most days to visit areas north of the Golden Gate Bridge or iconic locations within San Francisco.  We used BART one day when we went to Alcatraz ($9.00 per person, round-trip).  The communities near the Hampton Inn were nice and we ate at restaurants along El Camino Real or shopped at the Safeway.  All in all, the staff and hotel was awesome.  I had no complaints and found the hotel location to be a great base camp location for visiting San Francisco.

review.title: Clean but average hotel
review.reviewText: Room was very clean but I've stayed at much nicer Hampton Inns. I was expecting a bit nicer for the price.

review.title: Hotel close to airport
review.reviewText: Great breakfast. Shuttle to airport was easy.  Nice beds. Very clean and spacious room.

review.title: Excellent Hotel
review.reviewText: Needed a hotel for the weekend and found a great hotel that is clean with friendly staff and convenient location.  We did not use the shuttle so I could not comment on it.  Oh and despite its proximity to the airport the noise did not bother us.
The hotel was too noisy- needs better soundproofing

review.title: Very nice hotel
review.reviewText: Easy to find, great location.  We had a very enjoyable stay and will certainly be coming back!

review.title: Nice hotel for a  conference
review.reviewText: Attended conference at Marriott. Hotel was close to conference, efficient and very clean. There are 2 restaurants within walking distance. Hotel shuttle was on time for pick up and drop off.

review.title: Great hotel for a family
review.reviewText: Having realized that all hotels in San Francisco are expensive, we were "forced" to look South. Hampton Inn and Suites was a good choice.  We had a rental car so it was convenient and there is great, safe, free parking. The staff are very friendly and helpful.  The welcome cookies are yummy.  The 24 hour coffee is the best! And there are options! The hotel is clean and I have no regret whatsoever.  I am glad I found this place.
review.positiveRemarks: Affordable enough, clean, friendly and helpful staff, spacious enough, good shower, good area.  I basically like everything about the hotel.

review.title: Great Staff, Rooms and Location
review.reviewText: Super nice staff quickly checked us in.  Room was clean and very comfortable.  No restaurant at hotel so we walked across the street and ate at the Marriott.  Had to check out before breakfast and they offered to make us a breakfast bag to go!  Of course we forgot to pick it up.  I hate paying $400 for a hotel near the airport when I am getting 5 hours sleep however this hotel had reasonable rates and the perfect location.
review.positiveRemarks: Very close to the airport to return the rental car and make our 6:30 AM flight.  Staff was excellent, rooms large and comfy.
review.negativeRemarks: no suggestions
review.locationRemarks: This is an airport location.  Far from downtown but great if you have an early morning flight to make.

review.title: Nice Overnight Hotel
review.reviewText: Everything as advertised - clean room - good service!

review.title: Enjoyable stay near the airport!
review.reviewText: We were warmly greeted at check-in and very pleased with our room.  Everything was clean, heard no noise from the guests next door (good sound-proofing), wi-fi was free and the breakfast buffet was wonderful---many choices and the hot food was good.  Will definitely stay here again when in San Francisco!!
review.positiveRemarks: Friendly staff, free parking and wi-fi ( my husband needed it for work the next day), the clean rooms,and the many choices for the buffet breakfast.
review.negativeRemarks: My only suggestion would be to rotate the queen mattresses on a schedule to avoid one side being softer than the other.
review.locationRemarks: The hotel is close to the airport and close to freeway access going into San Francisco or heading south.

review.title: Hotel near SFO airport
review.reviewText: Good hotel, check in was easy, need a few options at the snack store, for the travelers that arrive late or leave before breakfast.  Airport shuttle service is good & efficient.
review.positiveRemarks: The indoor pool, nice warm temperature, gave us a an opportunity to relax, after sitting at the airport all day only to our flight canceled.
review.negativeRemarks: Wish there was something like bagels, donuts, or muffins & juice available for travelers that are leaving before 6:00am.
review.locationRemarks: Near the airport and offers shuttle service to and from the airport.

review.title: Nice hotel close to the airport
review.reviewText: Excellent hotel, nice room and great location close to SFO airport.

review.title: Close to the airport, but very quiet.
review.reviewText:
Great location, friendly staff... and very comfortable stay. Free shuttle to the airport made arriving to the hotel very easy, BART is only a short 15min walk away, or take the airport shuttle to get BART at the international terminal. 

This Hampton Inn lived up to the name and much more. Thank You.
review.positiveRemarks: Comfort, free shuttle.
review.locationRemarks: Close to the airport, mall and BART.

review.title: Convenient to visit SF
review.reviewText: Standard Hampton Inn, VERY nice staff. Enjoyed the breakfast every morning, good food, would have liked more vegetarian options for the hot foods.

review.title: Great Amenities, Very Clean Hotel
review.reviewText: The staff was great, hotel clean, free breakfast and parking.  Great room amenties, only problem was the bed.  The bed was very hard and was unable to sleep very well on it.
review.positiveRemarks: Loved the free breakfast, free parking, free coffee and cookies in evening.
review.negativeRemarks: Bed comfort.  Pillow top mattress would be ideal.
review.locationRemarks: Near SFO

review.title: Convenient to the airport
review.reviewText: We stay at this hotel sometimes before early morning flights out of SFO. Has everything needed, and the shuttle to and from the airport is dependable. Staff are friendly and competent. Beds are comfy and rooms are clean. In-and-Out Burger is within walking distance for a final supper before leaving the West Coast.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean and comfy.

review.title: Easy access to airport.
review.reviewText: Car was there for 7 days and no problems occurred. Shuttle to airport was easy and fast.
Would definitely stay here again. Breakfast was great, with plenty of options.

review.title: Great hotel near bay and airport.
review.reviewText: Had an enjoyable stay! Just wish I was able to spend more time in the city.

review.title: Near airport, but don't try to check in early
review.reviewText: We arrived early 12:40 after driving a long way and were told there would not be a room ready until 2. I asked if every single room was booked ( not likely according to the parking lot) and the girl at the front desk said yes and she also stated all of housekeeping was on a break. Even if they all were on break its not something I would say to a customer. The bed was comfortable and shower was nice.
review.positiveRemarks: Bed
review.negativeRemarks: Check- in stunk
review.locationRemarks: We booked it because we were flying out next am

review.title: Surprise $60 out of my credit card
review.reviewText:
I was going to write a rave review about this hotel, it was clean, comfy and friendly. But then I noticed a surprise after I had left. $60 was removed from my credit card which I had given them as 'security' in case something in the room was broken after we left (Nothing was). Most hotels do this, but never take any money. I stayed at hampton inn one night before an early flight and the room was left in perfect condition. I am very disappointed to see they stole my money without any explanation . I have emailed them multiple times to no avail. 
Do not stay here unless you want unexpected fees stolen from your credit card.

review.title: Attentive staff!
review.reviewText: I stayed at Hampton Inn and Suites while attending a week-long conference across the street at Marriott. From both my experience and what I heard from folks who stayed at Marriott, there are two perks that made me glad I chose Hampton: free internet vs $8/day at Marriott and free, albeit modest breakfast every day vs an overpriced menu. Also, the daily rate was about $50 cheaper! The desk staff and housekeeping staff were very accommodating and helpful. Be sure to ask about the Burlingame Trolley, as it is an easy way to increase your dining and shopping options!

review.title: Great location for an overnight layover
review.reviewText: This hotel is a mere 5 minute shuttle ride from the airport. A quick call to the hotel and the shuttle arrived within 5 minutes. Rooms are spacious and clean.  The free hot continental breakfast had great menu options such as omelettes, waffles and oatmeal.
review.positiveRemarks: The proximity to the airport, size and cleanliness of the rooms and the hot continental breakfast.
review.negativeRemarks: While in a great location, the hotel doesn't have an onsite restaurant.
review.locationRemarks: 5 minute shuttle ride from the airport

review.title: Nice stay overall
review.reviewText: We enjoyed our stay. The breakfast was great as was the hotel staff. Our only complaint - and the reason for the reduced room comfort - the AC unit rattled a lot and one of our lights did not work. We advised staff but the problem was not corrected prior to our departure. Otherwise - no complaints at all. Beds comfortable and the bathroom clean. Also important, the room was pretty quiet considering proximity to airport.
review.positiveRemarks: Convenient and Friendly
review.negativeRemarks: The rattling AC unit and the not working light fixture.
review.locationRemarks: Very convenient to airport - with a shuttle which is big plus. The downtown air of Burlingame is an interesting place within 10 minutes.

review.reviewText: no problems with room. staff great help. shuffle was prompt.
review.positiveRemarks: great location

review.title: Great hotel near airport.
review.reviewText: Very nice hotel near SFO.  Staff was friendly and helpful.  Spacious, clean rooms at great value.  Didn't have time for breakfast but staff offered us a to go bag.

review.title: One night
review.reviewText: Arrived late a d left early. Not enough time to format a realistic opinion.

review.title: Nice hotel near airport
review.reviewText: clean, conveniently close to airport via shuttle running each half hour; two blocks from good restaurant.

review.title: Great service, clean and professional atmosphere
review.reviewText: Great staff, very impressed with service. Shuttle Bus to/from SFO very pleasant and accommodating and pleasant.
review.positiveRemarks: Customer service and professional, clean environment.
review.negativeRemarks: Internet is a but slow but you can pay 5 dollars for faster.
review.locationRemarks: Close proximity to SFO and major highways. Rooms are quiet considering how close to airport.

review.title: Best hotel near SFO
review.reviewText: Convenient, clean, comfortable, helpful and friendly staff, excellent amenities - a great place to stay if you're catching an early flight!

review.title: Friendly and good value but..
review.reviewText:
Called the hotel from the free phone at the hotel shuttle pick up point and the shuttle came soon after  I suspect that they dont otherwise come as regularly at off peak periods. Very friendly driver assumed control of our bags from kerbside to room. In general staff were very friendly and helpful.
The hotel was generally good value given that parking breakfast and wifi were included but I would rate it as a two star. There was no hot water on the night of our arrival (fixed by morning); bung in sink didnt work properly and needed strong nails to extract; months in advance requested a corner king on the northside corner and was allocated one on the southside corner (noisier)  I felt that the receptionist wasnt sure of which way was north.
Bedroom was a reasonable size,  bed was comfortable but noisy due to the material in the mattress cover. Breakfast and coffee were pretty good.
Overall conclusion: good value base for that area or for commuting into San Francisco but I would probably try some other hotel next time
review.positiveRemarks: friendly staff
review.negativeRemarks: noisy mattress, bathroom fixtures, receptionist's sense of direction
review.locationRemarks: airport hotel with connections to downtown San Francisco

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Very pleasant.  Desk staff very helpful regarding San Francisco transportation.  Hotel breakfast was good.

review.title: Nice hotel, close to the airport
review.reviewText:
The staff at Hampton in Burlingame, from the front desk to housekeeping to the bus driver, were very friendly and helpful.  My rooms were always clean, the beds made and the rooms had a nice clean scent (nothing over bearing).  

The breakfast was excellent.  The food was tasty, hot and my husband and son really enjoyed making their own waffles in the waffel maker!  Get there early because it can get pretty crowded!

Overall, staying at the Hampton really made my vacation that much more enjoyable.  I recommend this hotel to everyone!
review.positiveRemarks: What I loked most about this hotel was the friendliness of the staff, the breakfast and the rooms.
review.negativeRemarks: I would suggest expanding the breakfast hours and/or offering a light brunch.
review.locationRemarks: The location was near the airport and business district.  There were really nothing to do near by, there was nothing really close.

review.title: Close to sf airport
review.reviewText: We used this facility as we were waiting to fly out on a late night flight.it was very suitable and there was a shuttle to the airport
review.positiveRemarks: Convenience and location
review.negativeRemarks: Late checkout would be an advantage
review.locationRemarks: Airport

review.title: Friendly, clean, and sensible.
review.reviewText: Really great staff, friendly and eager to help.  The location is great, and the building isn't huge but easy to manage.
review.positiveRemarks: Comfy, easy beds, good mattresses, not three feet above the floor like countless Tarzan Beds in other hotels.

review.title: Affordable accomodations
review.reviewText: Friendly staff, average accomodations. The shuttle was unreliable. Waited almost 2 hours for it when I arrived.
It was a nice, easy, comfortable experience. Nice courteous staff. Close to the BART system and close to the airport.
review.positiveRemarks: The buffet and the evening cookies. Nice clean, comfortable room. The airport shuttle.
review.negativeRemarks: Maybe a little more variety/meat  in the buffet.
review.locationRemarks: Not much to do near by but the BART is close by. The BART will take you any where you want to go in the bay area.

review.title: Close to airport and close to SF Bay.
review.reviewText: Hotel staff was helpful at check in which was very quick.  He was recommended a good restaurant in the area.  The room was very clean, the business center was great, and free breakfast (with fresh waffles) and great variety.
review.positiveRemarks: Staff was great, room was exceptionally clean, and free breakfast.
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing.
review.locationRemarks: Nice jogging path with view of San Francisco Bay was nice.  Very convenient to the SF airport.

review.title: Comfortable and convenient - Staff exceptional
review.reviewText: The hotel is comfortable, clean and convenient but the staff was exceptionally friendly and helpful.

review.title: Convenient for early morning flight
review.reviewText: I stayed here one night to be closer to the airport for an early flight out of SFO.  I picked this hotel because of the amenities:  microwave, refrig, free breakfast, 24 hour coffee/tea, and free shuttle.  Would definitely stay here again.
review.positiveRemarks: microwave, refrig, free breakfast, free shuttle, 24 hour self serve coffee/tea.

review.title: Very squared away
review.reviewText: Prompt, efficient service at desk. Perfectly neat, clean and well appointed room. Can't go wrong here.

review.title: The hotel satisfied our needs for the weekend.
review.reviewText: The staff at the front desk were very nice.  The breaksfast was satisfying and free parking and free wi fi service is what I look for in a hotel.  It was very convenient to have the park across the street to watch planes take off kept my 4year old entertained.

review.title: Convenient to SFO
review.reviewText: We stayed at this hotel on either end of a trip to Japan to break up the air travel. The shuttle bus has a regular schedule, the rooms were clean, beds comfortable, and the breakfast was reasonable. Although it was not inexpensive, this hotel was one of the least expensive south of the SFO terminal.

review.title: Great airport hotel!
review.reviewText: My stay at the was perfect. I arrived after almost 24 hours of grueling air travel. I was exhausted and could hardly wait to take a hot bath and go to bed. My room was spacious, comfortable, immaculate, and quiet. The service was excellent. I enjoyed the generous breakfast - especially all the fresh fruit. I took advantage of the complimentary shuttle transportation back to the airport after breakfast for the final flight of my trip well rested and refreshed.
review.positiveRemarks: Everything.
review.locationRemarks: Only a few minutes away from SFO and a 20 minute walk from Bart.

review.title: Good location
review.reviewText: Nice hotel in a good location. Close to Airport, Bart, etc... Pretty good hotel breakfast.

review.title: Close to airport
review.reviewText: It was a pleasant experience, I liked the toiletries and the breakfast to go, great idea

review.title: Nice staff!
review.reviewText: We arrived earlier than check in time and the young lady at the counter was very helpful with giving us maps and inviting us to join in on the breakfast.
review.positiveRemarks: the staff was very helpful
review.negativeRemarks: you almost had to slam the door for them to lock.
review.locationRemarks: Very close to grocery, airport, and places to eat just across Millbrae.

review.title: Nice staff, great room.
review.reviewText: One night stay before leaving for the airport. Very close and convenient. Also, baked very good cookies in the lobby. Yum! Thanks!

review.title: Great stay!
review.reviewText: Room was nice and comfortable and complimentary breakfast was awesome! Staff was friendly will stay again another time.
review.positiveRemarks: Continental breakfast

review.title: Close to airport and clean.
review.reviewText: This hotel was very close to the airport and offered fast shuttle service to and from the airport. Hotel was clean and had a great breakfast in the morning.
review.positiveRemarks: Good breakfast and close to airport.
Close to the airport , clean, comfortable beds and quiet. Had a great night sleep before our long trek

review.title: Great for the price
review.reviewText: Great for the price. Close to airport. Nice shuttle service. Clean and comfortable room.

review.title: Clean quiet business hotel
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, efficient, not too big and friendly helpful staff.
review.locationRemarks: Right on the freeway quick to anything on the peninsula without being noisy from the highway.

review.title: Nice hotel. Easy check in and nice staff.
review.reviewText: We stay here whenever we go to the Bay Area.

The hotel is close to the airport, but well constructed so that there is not much noise from departing or arriving airplanes. For those who have cars, the parking is free (not always the case in some of the other hotels). There is a breakfast buffet with fruit, cereal, pre-made omelets & waffles. The reception desk is geared to assist those who are making air flights early in the morning. A very pleasant stay.
review.positiveRemarks: Comfortable beds, large, rooms & good size bathrooms.
review.locationRemarks: Close to San Francisco, Coyote point gold course.

review.title: Nice hotel close to the airport
review.reviewText: clean, convenient, free shuttle and great breakfast...will stay here again.

review.title: Nice hotel near the airport
review.reviewText: Large, bright rooms, modern and big bathroom, good american breakfast included, free shuttle to the airport.

review.title: Business trip. Quick overnight.
review.reviewText: I stayed here less than 24 hours but found my room to be quite spacious, clean and comfortable.
review.positiveRemarks: Love the breakfast. Great proximity to my local work needs.
review.negativeRemarks: No comment. Didn't stay long enough.
review.locationRemarks: It works if you need to be close to the airport.

review.title: VERY ENJOYABLE
review.reviewText: N ICE , NICE PLACE WITH VERY COMPETENT PERSONAEL. IT IS A WONDERFUL PLACE TO STAY
review.positiveRemarks: ALMOST EVERYTHING
review.locationRemarks: EXCELLENT LOCATION. EVERYTHING NEARBY

review.title: Good location for BART
review.reviewText: Good breakfast, very nice room , good location don't like being required. Will skip next evaluation

review.title: Reasonable
review.reviewText: Pleasant. This hotel provides 24 hours coffee, tea and hot chocolate

review.title: Hampton Inn SFO
review.reviewText: Nice hotel overall. Very nice staff, friendly and courtious. Close to SFO. Clean room. Only drawback is our room faced out onto an overnight airport catering business. This led to hearing trucks backing up (BEEP, BEEP, BEEP) overnight which interrupted our sleep. Not good the night before a flight. Also, the privacy curtins which keep out light wouldn't close all the way. This was something else that contributed to disrupted sleep.

review.title: Nice hotel in a hill/trees surround hotel. Breath!
review.reviewText: We stayed here for one night to go to the Monterey Bay aquarium the next day, which is about 2 miles from hotel. I like the location of the hotel, it's somewhere in the mountain surrounded by big, beautiful trees (clean air). Room was pretty big, only thing I can complaint was that there was no AC in the room (unless I couldn't find it). Saw a heater, but couldn't figure out where the AC was. Good thing weather was in the 60's, so I guess I can survive with no AC, had to open the windows a bit. Beds were comfortable. Front desk person was nice. Breakfast was limited, but ok. Would stay here again.
review.positiveRemarks: Location. Complimentary breakfast.
review.negativeRemarks: AC in the room, maybe my room didn't have one?
review.locationRemarks: About 2-3 miles going East, you have Downtown Monterey, Monterey Bay Aquarium. We had a rental car, so easier to get by.

review.title: Only in town for one night...
review.reviewText: My husband and I were going to be in the San Francisco area for a concert. We did not want to drive back to Sacramento late at night. This was the perfect hotel for that. The price was reasonable so we booked. The facility was very clean and we were greeted right away. Prior to our arrival we called for a early check-on and that was no problem. The rooms were big enough and the shower was large.
review.positiveRemarks: The hotel was clean and that is the biggest need for me as a travelor.
review.negativeRemarks: In the morning the cleaning staff was kind of loud. It caused us to get up earlier than we had planned.
review.locationRemarks: The hotel is about 7 miles from Candlestick Park.

review.title: great time
review.reviewText: great breakfast , good location , but you need to have swimming pool and hot tub
review.positiveRemarks: coffee and hot tea every time, and of course breakfast
review.negativeRemarks: swimming pool or minimum hot tub
review.locationRemarks: good that close to express way and air port but, the water in the ocean dirty and stinky

review.title: Great hotel Close to airport.
review.reviewText: Great place. Staff very helpful and wonderful breakfast.
review.positiveRemarks: Very clean and plenty of supplies for your use. Airport shuttle service.
review.negativeRemarks: Maybe a shuttle sign up sheet. Missed the shuttle and couldn't wait for next one which was 40 mins. Later. But my fault not hotels.
review.locationRemarks: Easy to find next to 101. South of San Fran. Nice place to stay out of city.

review.title: Unable to watch news
review.reviewText: After spending 2 weeks in Yosemite, we were anxious to find out what was going on in the world. Unfortunately, all news channels(except for Fox News) were not functioning. What a bummer!
review.positiveRemarks: Staff was friendly. Bed was clean and comfortable.

review.title: A dismal and expensive experience
review.reviewText: Provides the minimum necessary. Elevator carpet dirty and stained. No restaurant available. In-room refrigerator empty. Go across the street to the Marriot on the Bay.
review.positiveRemarks: none

review.title: Great airport hotel.
review.reviewText: It was easy to find the hotel. Rooms are not new but clean. It was impossible to use air conditioning due to high noise. Very good place to stay before and/or after SFO flights. The total experience was good, i will be happy to stay again. The AC of my room needs a little repairment.
review.positiveRemarks: Fresh breakfast, clean room.
review.negativeRemarks: Noise of air conditioning, crowded.
review.locationRemarks: Easy to access, close to airport.

review.title: close to airport
review.reviewText: Staff was very friendly. We had an early and were glad there was an early shuttle to the airport.
review.positiveRemarks: Close to airport

review.title: Just what expected
review.reviewText: It is a typical airport hotel; perfect for what it is designed for. Great for a night before a very early flight. Comfortable, clean, quiet rooms. Very convenient to the airport. Did not use the hotel shuttle, but saw it at the entrance to the hotel at 4 am.
review.positiveRemarks: Location close to the airport

review.title: Satisfied
review.reviewText: Staff was very helpful. Good value for a quick stay.

review.title: Great for staying near SFO
review.reviewText:
Exceeded my expectations. Very close to SFO with shuttle service. Extremely clean room and bathroom. Looks like some cosmetic restoration going on in hallways, not obtrusive.

Got in very late and wanted tea. The breakfast room has coffee/tea 24/7 which was really nice after a long journey.

Breakfast was basic continental +, good enough.

Hotel is perfect when you're flying in/out and need close proximity to the airport.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean
review.locationRemarks: Perfect, near SFO with free shuttle

review.title: needed to be close to the airport
review.reviewText: good location close to airport. shuttle service was on -time

review.title: Close to SFO
review.reviewText: This hotel was selected as it was close to the airport and reasonably priced. The layout was nice and the free parking was a cost savings. Very clean throughout and quiet as well. I would stay there again if needing someplace close to the airport.

review.title: great hotel for a good price
review.reviewText: my husband and i went to hawaii for vacation and being from the east coast decided to stop in san francisco for a couple of days. i was actually really surprised by the hotel because we had figured considering the price it was not going to be a great hotel. all of the staff we dealt with were super nice and helpful. they had great recommendations on places to eat and were good with directions. we had picked a hotel close to the bart system because we had decided to use the public transportation system to get around san francisco. the staff was able to give us great directions to the closest bart station and were able to tell us stops and schedules of both bart and airport shuttles. the beds were super comfy and the hot water was actually hot and had good pressure in the shower. complimentary breakfast was very good and included eggs and sausage and waffles, not just toast and cereal. we walked all around the area near the hotel and felt safe doing so. bart station was only a 10 minute walk away
review.positiveRemarks: complimentary breakfast and staff knowledge
review.negativeRemarks: none
review.locationRemarks: airport shuttle took about 15 minutes. close to bart station and restaurants

review.title: Enjoyable stay
review.reviewText: We were warmly received by the hotel staff after some confusion as to which Hampton Inn we were to go to (there are two listed near the San Francisco airport). Adding to the welcome were freshly baked cookies.
review.positiveRemarks: Warmth of greeting and assistance
review.negativeRemarks: Scrambled eggs at breakfast ..... ugh!
review.locationRemarks: Very convenient

review.title: Near to airport
review.reviewText: This would be the perfect hotel if you are staying for 1 night for next day flight. Very near to airport.

review.title: Great convienent hotel.
review.reviewText:
My husband and i stay here everytime we visit family in the area. Hotel is so close to freeway, always clean and has a great staff. We appreciate the great breakfast buffett they offer. I have recommended this hotel to others and they've agreed its a great place to stay.
There's no charge for parking like most other airport area hotels. The lobby has a warm feeling that welcomes you to just hang out and read or watch tv. Checking in has been consistently simple. Takes just a few minutes. Definitely recommend to friends and family.
review.locationRemarks: Excrptional.

review.title: Nice and quiet
review.reviewText: Hotel was close to the airport, but not close enough to hear the planes. It was easy to find. The beds were super comfortable and I could have slept longer. It had a fridge and a microwave which I always find convenient. The breakfast served in the morning was one of the best I've had at a hotel. It had everything. I would definitely stay here again.
review.positiveRemarks: the bed
review.negativeRemarks: the carpet
review.locationRemarks: Location was perfect, close to airport

review.title: Convenient to SFO
review.reviewText:
First off, my experience started with the airport shuttle. A short, 15 minute wait and the shuttle arrived as expected. I never had to call the hotel to dispatch the shuttle. The shuttle was very clean and comfortable and the driver was more than helpful. Upon arrival, the desk attendant was very friendly and got me checked in very quickly. My room was superb and the rest of the amenities were everything I have come to expect from Hampton Inn.

The following morning, I proceeded downstairs for a quick breakfast and waiting for the 7 AM shuttle departure which was perfectly on time and a quick 5 minute transit to the airport and my stay was complete.

The only downside to this hotel is there is not much nearby. The Elephant Bar down the street is the closest restaurant and bar without going to a competing hotel across the street. Otherwise, the hotel is right in the middle of the airport industry district. However, there is a very nice waterfront park trail across the street that would be very nice for relaxation and watching the planes come in.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean, comfortable room, very friendly staff.
review.negativeRemarks: No restaurant or bar in the hotel, meaning one has to walk 3 blocks to get a drink.
review.locationRemarks: In the middle of industry, therefore not very appealing but is a perfect location for layovers or business travelers.

review.title: Good hotel for anyone.
review.reviewText: I stayed in this superb hotel for two nights with my parents. It locates very closed to the airport but quiet. The room is clean, warm, and comfortable. The staffs are friendly and effective. Especially the complimentary breakfast impressed me most.
review.positiveRemarks: Breakfast
review.locationRemarks: Located aside the 101 and closed to the airport. Numerous good restaurant are at the other side of 101.

review.title: Great if you need a hotel close to the airport...
review.reviewText: Helpful staff. Breakfast not that great....no healthy choices.

review.title: Fun times with the family
review.reviewText: Andrew was at the desk when I called to confirm an even number room to be on the quiet side of the hotel. He was super friendly and accommodating. When we arriived he was working and remembered talking to me a week prior. He gave us the 411 on downtown San Francisco parking and map quested us directions as well. He went overboard to make our stay awesome. The airport shuttle was great as well. I would stay here again for sure!
review.positiveRemarks: Friendly Andrew and close to airport
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing
review.locationRemarks: Great for flights and downtown sight seeing. Much less than downtown San Francisco hotels.

review.title: good value
review.reviewText: Good hotel, nice breakfast, super close to airport SFO... overall very good value for the money.

review.title: Convenient for visiting the city
review.reviewText: Traveled with a group of 10, between us we had 4 rooms all close together, clean and comfortable. The staff was gracious. Breakfast was plentiful and there were many choices. Parking was limited and 1 night had to leave the car in the entry area intil the next day. the only thing we missed was a pool and jacuzzi, but we spent most of our time in the city anyway so not a big deal.

review.title: Best in its price class
review.reviewText: I think Hampton Inn possibly has the best quality in its price class. Of course, this was an airport hotel stay, just 10 hours until our flight. It did its job just fine, including getting us to and from the airport terminal. Bed was quite comfy.
review.locationRemarks: near SFO Airport

review.title: OK if you spend very little time in room
review.reviewText: The hotel seems to need a good make over. The hotel seemed almost empty, and it was a little strange being so close to the airport. The wi-fi was free but VERY slow. The hotel was greatly overpriced for the quality.
review.positiveRemarks: Close to airport. Stayed the night before our 6:00am departure.
review.negativeRemarks: The hotel seemed to need a lot of attention.

review.title: Good looking!!
review.reviewText:
The hotel was pleasing in sight, service and overall appeal.
Everything was fine except no pool!!
review.positiveRemarks: The breakfast!!
review.negativeRemarks: No pool!
review.locationRemarks: Really great for SFO & even okay for Oakland travelers

review.title: THE BEST EVER!
review.reviewText: Fantastic! We got there later then expected, there were fresh baked cookies at the counter, the BEST personnel behind the desk giving us all kinds of help with suggestions on which restaurant to eat at, to helping us with our rental car delivery. We took our rental car back in the evening to eliminate the hassle in the morning and a hotel shuttle picked us up. They were AWESOME and we could not have found a better motel, for helpfulness, cleanliness, close to the airport, walk to eating it was perfect for us. :O)
review.positiveRemarks: Cookies and hot coffee all the time, warm homey atmosphere!
review.negativeRemarks: We waited a bit for the shuttle at the airport for being so close.
review.locationRemarks: It was about 7 minutes from the airport but not noisy.

review.title: hotel not at its best.
review.reviewText: The hotel was OK. Needed to be updated a little. Wish there had been a restaurant closer than having to walk across a very busy street.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean bed and sheets. Comfortable bed.
review.negativeRemarks: Noisy door on elevator.

review.title: Great hotel for the busy Exec.
review.reviewText: Staff was knowledgeable and efficient. Room was fine. TV channel locator card was appreciated. Complimentary breakfast was good. No complaints.

review.title: Quiet place of comfort
review.reviewText: Very good!!!!! I really enjoyed my stay at this hotel. It was comfrotable, clean and friendly. The free breakfast was amazing

review.title: good airport hotel for SFO
review.reviewText: Clean with helpful and friendly staff. If you need to stay near the airport, this is a reasonable place.

review.title: Wonderful experience
review.reviewText: From the moment we arrived at the hotel (which was 9 am), the front desk accomodated us all the way by offering us a room and breakfast right away. They went out of their way to help us decide on which sights to see and could not do enough to make our stay as pleasant as possible. Would definitely recommend Hampton Inn. It has a great location - only five minutes from the airport and twelve miles from the city not to mention the fact that the bay is just across the street with a wonderful walkway.
review.positiveRemarks: Location, free parking, room cleanliness, breakfast and a friendly experienced staff.
review.negativeRemarks: None.
review.locationRemarks: Very convenient to airport (5 minutes) and 12 miles from the city as well as proximity to the highway. Wonderful restaurant (The Elephant) close by.

review.title: Nice Hotel
review.reviewText: Staff was friendly and even called my room to ask if everything was OK, or if I needed anything.
review.positiveRemarks: Breakfast was good, had a nice selection of items. Free parking was appreciated.
review.negativeRemarks: Beeping noise from trucks backing up at night from business next door. Next time will ask for a room on the other side of the building.
review.locationRemarks: Convienient to my business trip, near the airport, freeway, and several nice restaurants.

review.title: Great hotel for anyone.
review.reviewText: Everyone at the front desk was extremely nice. The room was clean and the bed was very comfortable.
review.positiveRemarks: The people at the front desk.
review.negativeRemarks: None
review.locationRemarks: Location was very convenient for the airport and restaurants.

review.title: Could use a renovation; great breakfast
review.reviewText:
This hotel has a staff that is very willing to help. It is also a hotel that could be renovated and the guests would benefit. Our adult daughter also joined us and the sofa bed was extremely uncomfortable both as a bed and as a couch.

The breakfast had the greatest variety of any that I have ever stayed in. It was replenished frequently and the hot offerings were hot and the cold ones were cold.
review.positiveRemarks: Breakfast
review.negativeRemarks: sofa-bed
review.locationRemarks: The location is great and there is a terrific walk along the Bay across the road. Minimal airplane noise considering proximity to the airport

review.title: Suitable for short stay whilst in transit.
review.reviewText: For a short stay waiting for your ongoing flights out of San Fran this hotel is most suitable. Rooms were comfortable enough for the 2 nights but wouldn't recommend for an extended stay especially if you wanted to explore the bay area and you don't have your own transport. Even though we were able to use the hotels shuttle to the airport and then catch the train into town it was still a bit of a hassle. And there is not much to see and do in walking distance from the hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: Staff were pleasant and the complimentary brekfast quite good.
review.negativeRemarks: Not being able to have a later than normal checkout ie 2pm would've been great!
review.locationRemarks: Ok so long as you are short stay waiting for connecting flights or have your own transport

review.title: Good for a nights stay
review.reviewText: The hotel is very close to sfo, yet air traffic was not an issue. The hotel was just not as comfortable as most hampton's I have stayed in. While the beds were a bit hard I did have a goodnights sleep.
review.positiveRemarks: The staff
review.negativeRemarks: Room 111 way to close to lobby, you can hear everything

review.title: My review of Hampton Inn
review.reviewText: No problems at all with stay. Good service, clean room. Fitness room should open before 8 a.m. though.

review.title: Nice...
review.reviewText: Nice room! We enjoyed our stay! The room has enough space for us (My husband and I and our baby).
review.positiveRemarks: Complete amenities
review.negativeRemarks: none
review.locationRemarks: Quiet and easy to get to...

review.title: Family Visit
review.reviewText: Spacious rooms. I was there with three other family members--two rooms and the lobby was such a nice place to congregate, have a cup of coffee in the afternoon and the breakfast was wonderful. Front desk staff helped us with maps and direcrtions to where we were going. Would surely stay there again if traveling in San Francisco.

review.title: Clean, quiet, and Confortable
review.reviewText: This is a standard quality Hampton Inn, 1 exit south of SFO on 101. It is very convenient for short stays to catch early morning flights. The hotel was clean, quiet and comfortable. Restaurants are located a few miles away in Burlingame, but there are good choices.

review.title: SUPER!
review.reviewText: Service and breakfast were excellent! Hotel was well kept and very clean.

review.title: Stay here, great staff!
review.reviewText: Staff was great! They understood our needs and very helpful when the taxi driver was shady with us!
review.positiveRemarks: Free Breakfast
review.negativeRemarks: Hotel Shuttle
review.locationRemarks: Not sure, didn't go out.

review.title: SFO hotel
review.reviewText:
This was our second stay at this hotel We have used it as a break up stop from the long S.E. Asia flights we make each year coming and going from Ohio to Asia.
Convenient to airport, has regular shuttle good breakfast selection.
The only problem we had was the carpet in the room was very dirty. Management said it was probably because that the room was just painted and the painters left it that way.
So who checked the room after the painters finished?
This was not a valid excuse.
If you do not have a car the restaurant choices are very limited.
However on the overall the hotel is OK taking in consideration the level of the hotel chain.

review.title: Expensive for condition
review.reviewText: Hotel needs updating, the bathroom in our room was ugly with wall paper and sheetrock coming loose by the shower and holes in the shower were caulked and the escutcheon for the shower head didn't cover the hole that was cut in the wrong place.
review.positiveRemarks: Our room was quiet and the breakfast had something for everyone.
review.negativeRemarks: Condition of room
review.locationRemarks: 15 minutes from airport

review.title: Hampton Inns & suites, Burlingame
review.reviewText: We did not see this hotel in its best light as they were in the process of remodelling the lobby! However, the disruption aside, a very comfortable and reasonably priced option , of the many that are available around SFO
review.positiveRemarks: Hot beverages available 24 hours a day.
review.negativeRemarks: The bathroom doors - impossible to close quietly especially during a call of nature in the wee hours, if you will pardon the pun :)

review.title: Hotel near airport
review.reviewText: Hotel is under construction so it was hard to say anything about the entrance or lobby. Those are the parts being worked on. Close the the airport, across the street from the Marriott. Great restaurant down the street from hotel - Elephant Bar.

review.title: Dissappointed after reading good reviews....
review.reviewText: The lobby and downstairs was being remodeled and looked unappealing. The staff was unhelpful and somewhat argumentative when 2 people in my group missed an Airport Shuttle because the driver failed to announce its arrival. (The driver had announced the previous shuttle 1/2 hour before, while we were downstairs having breakfast, so we assumed that was the regular practice).
review.negativeRemarks: As above!
review.locationRemarks: Nothing special, but close to the airport and quiet

review.title: Stayed here because of the reviews I reviewed!
review.reviewText: We appreciated the selection of the breakfast each morning! Very comfortable room, about 15 minutes from downtown San Fran. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Would stay again and would recommend to friends.

review.title: Clean and Comfortable
review.reviewText: The hotel staff was friendly. The room was pretty clean. It was a bit far from downtown (half an hour). There are a few restaurants nearby (El Torito, Benihana's). We ate across the street at the Mariott's bar and ate right in front of the Bay. The hotel wasn't noisy. It was comfortable, especially for the price. There was free parking, Wifi, and continental breakfast. Definitely recommend this hotel. The Bart is located exactly a mile away. We were able to park there (for free on Sun., but a small fee every other day).
review.positiveRemarks: Free parking, Wifi, and breakfast. It was right across the bay for a nice stroll or for a nice dinner at the hotel across the street).
review.negativeRemarks: Location from SF (30 mins. away). Nice location from airport though.
review.locationRemarks: Location was great from airport, but not great from downtown San Francisco. The Bart is 1 mile away (which was nice).

review.title: Good location, clean place
review.reviewText: Professional service by all members of staff. Microwave & refrigerator in room-very useful. Comfortable bed & linens. Good location with easy access to the city.

review.title: Clean, decent hotel.
review.reviewText: Easy access from the Freeway after a very long day. Good, clean accomidation with helpful night staff.

review.title: Great Place for the Monies
review.reviewText: It's a great hotel to stay in if you plan on just using it for a place to sleep. There's an AMAZING restaurant in the Mariott across the street, so you can still eat there if you can't afford to stay at the hotel.

review.title: We were completely satisfied with this hotel. It is in a great area, nearby the airport.
review.reviewText: If I had to do it again I wouldn't hesitate to use this hotel. The staff were great and, the hotel SUPER clean, and they even gave us a snack daily at the front desk if we did not have time to stay for a meal. They were wonderful.

review.title: Great if you need to be close to airport
review.reviewText: Very happy with room. breakfast was great. would have liked to be closer to San Francisco, but was much cheaper to stay this far out. would stay here again.

review.title: Great price, good location
review.reviewText:
Nicely appointed comfortable rooms. Very spacious including the bathroom. Very quiet. We were near the elevators, which concerned me at first until we got inside. No noise!
Good breakfast and well laid out, especially the coffee bar. Easy to get to, good choices, even decent coffee.
All in all a great deal at any price, especially the low one I got on Expedia.

review.title: Great hotel, will definitely stay here again.
review.reviewText:
Just south of the SFO airport, this hotel is easy to find and provides an excellent value for your money. It is located in a very nice area with many conveniences within a 2-3 miles of the hotel. Parking is free and check-in/check-out was painless. Even though the hotel is close to the airport and highway we never had an issue with outside noise. We had neighbors on both sides of us but no noise from any of those rooms either.

Room includes an HDTV (yes, true flat screen) with a full HD cable lineup (yes, REAL high-def) and Showtime movie channel. WIFI is provided free of charge as well and available in your room. A "business" room is available on the first floor where you can print out your airline tickets.

Continental breakfast is provided free of charge from 6-10am each morning and provides a good basic food choice. Bagels, bread, cereal, oatmeail, eggs, sausage, bacon, waffles, fruit, yogurt, coffee, tea, juices. As continental breakfasts go, this one ranks near the top.

This hotel is a good 30-40 minutes from San Francisco depending upon traffic, but only about 5 minutes from SFO airport. We rented a car but there is airport shuttle service available to/from the hotel.

Burlingame is a very nice, clean, and friendly community with many conveniences.

review.title: Can't beat it for the price!
review.reviewText: Great hotel! Nicely prices, convenient to the SF airport or for a trip into the city for a game or just to explore. The hotel was clean, there is free breakfast (and it tastes great too!), free parking (which is close to priceless in SF), helpful staff, the rooms were clean, and fairly comfy. The beds are a little hard for my liking, but really not bad at all. Will stay again- this was our second stay here and it was just as good as the first!

review.title: S. F. Stay
review.reviewText: Only at the hotel for one night. Desk personnel were extremely helpful with dining suggestions and securing a bag that did not get transferred with our luggage. Hotel was very clean and comfortable. I would stasy here again. The breakfast was very nice.

review.title: very impress and convenient
review.reviewText:
The hotel was not too far from the airport, nice restaurant within walking distant. All the attractions are about half hour away. The staff were very nice and helpful. Enjoy the hot and cold breakfast. The hotel was very clean.
Would stay at this hotel again.

review.title: Reliable comfort
review.reviewText: Very good value. shuttle service to airport. Comfortable bed. Clean lobby and room

review.title: good
review.reviewText: my kids enjoyed it!!!

review.title: Not the best but clean and comfy
review.reviewText: The hotel main areas were a bit dated but the room was clean and the bed was comfy. It was also convenient, just one exit away from the airport. I will stay here again.

review.title: Nice hotel, challenge with key
review.reviewText:
This is a really nice hotel, great location, comfortable rooms, very nice service with breakfast and all the staff. The challenge was with the room key card. We had to go back at least 10 times to get one that worked. Someone mentioned it might be the battery, someone else said that room is one that doesn't work all the time. Wouldn't the first time have been the time to get the battery changed or the situation corrected? The the treadmill was broken, which wasn't all bad as I walked across the street and took the path by
the bay, which was lovely. We could watch the planes come and go and
it was a nice experience. All in all, I'd stay there again. I booked 4 of us
for the weekend and everyone enjoyed the hotel. Gulliver's is within
walking distance (good prime rib and steaks, etc).. also many other
restaurants within walking distance.

review.title: Nice & Clean
review.reviewText: The hotel staff checked us in almost right after we entered the hotel. Once we got into our room, we checked for bed bugs a few areas where we thought we would possibly catch them, but there was none. The room was nice and clean. The hotel location was closed to US101, but not too closed so we were still able to enjoy the quiet time when we stayed there. The parking and breakfast were free (we only checked out the breakfast bar about twice or so during our week long stay). The hotel was very clean and exceeded out expectation. We would certainly stay there again in the future...

review.title: Nice Room
review.reviewText: nice room and relatively quiet even near the airport

review.title: Nice Hote,l close to Air port
review.reviewText:
I have nothing negative about this hotel, except being close you would hear Air plane landing/take off muffed sound in some of the room. Also, exhaust fan in my room was little louder but did not bother at night.

Breakfast was fantastic and airport transport service was an excellent.

Staff was extremely polite and helpful. They took extra effort to prepare my room early and provided before check-in time since we were there early and wanted to unload luggage so we can visit San Fransisco city.

review.title: Prime Location awesome breakfast
review.reviewText: Hotel was the perfect local close to Airport, ideal to tour San Francisco, Monterey

review.title: SF Airport Hotel
review.reviewText: I would definitely recommend. Comfortable room. Great breakfast. Convenient location with free shuttle service.

review.title: Not great but ok
review.reviewText:
The bathroom door kept shutting and there was a stopper on the bottom of the door to keep it open, however it was a real pain to have to put it up or take it down. Also, why are there no vent fans in the bathroom? Trying to get ready in a steaming bathroom after a shower was no fun.
The breakfast was good and plentiful.
The personnel was good, however a couple of people had very strong accents and it was difficult understanding them over the phone.
I would stay here again as overall it was fine.

review.title: Great airport convenience
review.reviewText: We love the Hampton in and highly recommend they to our friends.

review.title: My second stay
review.reviewText: I chose this hotel because of convernience, great breakfast, clean, secure, near airport, good price, friendly staff,free parking, clean parking lots, near freeway, close to downtown San Francisco, nice comfortable rooms, everything I needed to make my trip fast and convenient. I won't stay anywhere else!

review.title: Good jumping off point to SFO
review.reviewText: We wanted to stay overnight for an early flight at a dependable hotel. Hampton Inn fit the bill. We had a delicious dinner at a nearby restaurant and early to bed. We appreciated the free Wi Fi.

review.title: Good place to stay
review.reviewText: Great place to stay if arriving late or leaving early at San Francisco airport.

review.title: Find them always clean and modern
review.reviewText: Clean Hotel

review.title: Well maintained and convenient hotel.
review.reviewText: The Hampton Inn ranks somewhat higher in my estimation than some of its nearby competitors. Rooms are a bit larger, the hotel staff more accomodating, and the breakfast the Hampton provides is quite tasty. All in all, our stay was most pleasant.

review.title: Great overall hotel with parking, food, wireless internet included.
review.reviewText: I had a courtesty rental car so this location for Hampton in Burlingame was perfect for us. The hotel included free parking, internet, buffet breakfast, and courtesy shuttle. If you need to print anything there is also a courtesy computer and printer in the lobby. Location is just a few minutes away to the BART station where you can park the car and take the BART downtown so very easy. The only thing lacking in the location is a restaurant unless you have a car to drive. Nothing within walking distance after 10 pm.

review.title: Great service. Good value.
review.reviewText: We used 3 rooms on a recent trip to S.F. and couldn't have been happier with the rooms and especially the service. The shuttle driver and the front desk were terrific.

review.title: San Francisco Internatonal Airport
review.reviewText: Very convenient shuttle ran continuously to the airport. Excellent breakfast with hot and cold items. Clean room. Spacious bathroom.

review.title: Hotel Review
review.reviewText: Our stay at the Hampton Inn was a positive experience. The room was clean and comfortable, and the staff was friendly and helpful. This was our first trip to the San Francisco area, and we felt very secure in our room and the neighborhood of the hotel. We liked that the hotel was so close to the air port. The only thing we did not like was that breakfast was not very good. There was no bacon, the eggs had vegetables in them, and the waffles were rubbery. I expect more than toast and cereal when I stay at a hotel. We loved the free parking, and the wifi worked very effortlessly. Overall, we enjoyed our stay and would return :)

review.title: "Can't Wait to go back" Can't beat the price for the quality
review.reviewText:
Great Experenice with the Hampton Inn and Suites in Burlingame, Ca.
The staff was very nice and helpful and the whole Inn was very clean.
I felt very compfortable there, It was our first time at a Hamption and I would recommend this hotel to family and Freinds.. For the price , you get quite a few extras that some 5 star hotels do not even offer anymore..

review.title: More than acceptable
review.reviewText: We chose this hotel because we needed to get to the airport for a 6 a.m. flight. The shuttle was right on time at 4 a.m. The facilities were fine, not spectacular, but fine.

review.title: You get what you paid for
review.reviewText: The room rate looks a bit pricey compared with the others for 2.5 stars. But you get what you paid for. Room was clean, staff was friendly and nice breakfast.

review.title: loved it
review.reviewText: Very comfortable in every way in a final night stay in SF.

review.title: Good Value
review.reviewText:
First, I was sure that being that close to the airport, I'd get lots of airplane noise. Pleasantly surprised. Noise was rare and faint. Second, I read all these glowing reviews, so just assumed my expectations had been set too high and would be disappointed. Not the case. The hotel is fine. The room (King with a desk area) was quiet, clean and spacious. I really liked the fact that they clean the duvets between customers. Desk and internet setup was great. Breatkfast ok. I always go to Peets' for serious coffee anyway.
Only complaint was that I had a couple mechanical issues (refrigerator too cold, bathtub plug leaked) that never got properly resolved. I had business and visits in South Bay, SF, and Berkeley/Oakland. Very convenient to get to those places. Would stay there again.

review.title: Very Good Hotel
review.reviewText: Great location, quiet, inexpensive compared to in-city hotels. Nice firm beds, clean. Super breakfast.

review.title: Impressed in San Francisco
review.reviewText: I love the breakfast at this Hotel I stayed while the World Cup was playing and had to take my breakfast to my room because there were not enough tables. Thats my only sugestion, need to add more tables. I enjoyed my stay and will come back. The staff is very friendly.

review.title: Great Hotel!
review.reviewText: Only stayed one night. Very friendly staff and a great breakfast. Very accommodating. I would definitely stay here again

review.title: Why pay $50 for parking!?!
review.reviewText: Why pay $40-60 per night for hotel parking downtown when you can stay here with free parking? It takes about 10 mins. driving time to get downtown. Would stay here again and again.

review.title: excellent
review.reviewText: We were very happy with the accomodations and would stay at a Hampton's Inn again.

review.title: will stay next time
review.reviewText: Highly recommended. Easy to find, roomy and clean. Nice complimentary breakfast.

review.title: Motel with Hotel Service
review.reviewText: Thank you! It was a great time, perfect service and friendly stuff. We could not get enough of the breakfast.

review.title: Clean Hotel
review.reviewText: This hotel service and breakfast is good. I definitely will stay in this hotel again.

review.title: Best deal we've found so close to San Francisco.
review.reviewText: The hotel was nicer than we expected and a terrific bargain for the Bay area. The staff, from the desk clerks to the room maids and everyone in between, was friendly, helpful and very efficient going out of their way to make our stay more enjoyable. Everyone had a smile and seemed to enjoy his/her work. A highlight was the breakfast and large room with many tables and chairs, not always the case. There was a large selection of food which varied each day including a hot, fresh egg dish (omelets or scrambled or fried); breakfast meat (bacon or sausage or ham); make-your-own waffles; fresh fruit and, my favorite, fresh fruit salad; bagels, muffins, cereals; yogurt; and I'm probably forgetting something. Oh, and lots of good, hot coffee, tea, hot chocolate, and juice. This saved our family of four a substantial amount of money. Usually, we eschew the "continental breakfast" and eat out, adding about $40+ to our daily expenses. I will stay at this Hampton again as it was only about 15 minutes from San Francisco.

review.title: Clean hotel
review.reviewText: Will stay again when at San Fransisco

review.title: Road trip in California
review.reviewText: We were in San Francisco for a two day break on our 10 day road trip through California. The hotel was very close to San Francisco, we attended a baseball game and were back our out hotel 15 minutes after the last out. It was a quiet location with no airport noise at all. Hotel was clean and the staff were friendly. Breakfast in the morning was excellent as well. I would definitely recommend this hotel to others.

review.title: Will definitely stay there again inspite of the manager!
review.reviewText: Should limit kids time in business centre who play games and hoard the computer for a long time

review.title: GREAT, especially for the price!
review.reviewText: The Hotel was really great! Everything was as expected... the rooms were clean, the staff was friendly, the hotel was clean, FREE PARKING and we had NO trouble finding a space even late in the evening, FREE breakfast which included yogurt, fresh fruit, waffles, ham, bagels, toast, cereals and MORE... coffee and hot chocolate were also always available (a nice treat coming in from a cold evening in SF), an easy drive into the city and to the ball park. My only complaint is that the beds were not as comfortable as I would've liked, they were typical hard hotel beds although the bedding was much nicer and I was able to compensate a little with all of the pillows. I would definitely stay here again!!

review.title: Best place for business/pleasure
review.reviewText: This hotel has everything. They give you free cookies and breakfast. I'll stay here every time I'm in the area. Good for business and pleasure.

review.title: pleasant surprise
review.reviewText:
I am fairly picky when it comes to hotels. and I was pleasantly surprised. For the price it was a nice room, clean and comfortable.
The breakfast buffet choices were so-so, but a nice feature was having the hot dishes change from day to day, so there was a better chance of having something we liked. The service staff in the dining hall was excellent -attentive, friendly and efficient.
The hotel itself was attractive and well-maintained.
We will come back again.

review.title: Good size rooms with mini-kitchen made it a plus.
review.reviewText: Hotel had easy access to and from airport and to town areas (by car). Rooms were clean and staff courteous. Not a high end hotel but with a mini-kitchen was very helpful for multiple days of stay. Would have preferred if the bed was in a separate room with it's own t.v. But for the money a good hotel.

review.title: Convenient Location - Great Rate
review.reviewText: Great Hotel for the money. Located conveniently off freeway, easy access to most of Bay Area. Very few walking distance restaurants. Awesome Breakfast .

review.title: Good friendly service
review.reviewText: Close to the airport, very friendly and accomodative staff. The gentleman at the reception was extremely gracious and very helpful. We reached there after a long flight, and the gentleman at the reception desk was very nice and helpful. I would recommend this place for a stay close to the airport.

review.title: I would definetly consider staying their again!!!
review.reviewText: Great comfort...breakfast buffet was great..

review.title: Comfy, Clean & Best Breakfast!
review.reviewText: I was very impressed with the room. It was spacious and I loved the love seat & coffee table. The room was cozy. The bathroom was big, bright, and clean. I loved the large array of foods at breakfast, it was the best hotel free breakfast I have ever had. The lobby was nice to eat in or just hang on the couch to watch the big tv. The airport shuttle was frequently making trips, so that was comforting to know.

review.title: Good Value. Convenient Location. Friendly Staff
