review.reviewText: Good location next to the airport and near the city. Free parking and breakfast is a +.

review.title: Nice, clean, good value & good breakfast
review.reviewText:
Enjoyed my stay for one night. Room was clean and comfortable.
Hotel was also clean and the check in and check out people were pleasant and quick. Breakfast buffet was good too. Would definitely stay here again, unless I was looking for the "ritz".

review.title: We found a confortable place for future visits.
review.reviewText: San Francisco is very space challenged. It was nice to retreat to a very confortable hotel with plenty of space around. The staff and facilities were more than we expected, yet it did not have the coldness of larger chains. My family can't wait for our next visit.

review.title: Would definitely stay there again.
review.reviewText: Neat and clean hotel with comfotable beds and pillows. Complimentary breakfast was great considering it was free. No parking fees was a plus. Staff was very friendly and professional.

review.title: A very good hotel near SFO
review.reviewText: This Hampton Inn and Suites near SFO is very conveniently located with many eateries nearby. All things met our expectations.

review.title: San Fran Airport
review.reviewText: An airport usually has a convenient location Period. - This hotel has clean and spacious rooms - comfy mattresses - and long duvet covers. This is important - as jet lag can make a person crabby. And therefore - you need all the creature comforts. Plus - a Super Breakfast. And priced reasonable. Shall use this location again.

review.title: Excellent and cheap
review.reviewText: everybody of the staff excellent,the breakfast was different every day and the bathroom is bigger than other hotels

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText:
Nice clean hotel near to SFO airport.

Rooms clean and comfortable.

1 nice restauant within walking distance of the hotel, The Elephant Bar.

Only problem was the 30+ minute wait for the shuttle bus from SFO to the hotel.

review.title: No complaints!
review.reviewText: We stayed one night and wished we had stayed longer. The room condition was good, location was close to the airport and service was pleasant. Breakfast was ok, not bad at all. Would recommend this to everybody. San Fransisco is a small city and we got to Fisherman's Warf within 30 mins.

review.title: Overpriced in SFO market
review.reviewText: This hotel is over priced for the amenities available in the SFO market. Early the next week I stayed at another SFO hotel for 56%(weekday) of the first hotel's rate(weekday). They also served sour milk two consecutive days and did not correct the problem when notified.

review.title: Convenient to/from SFO
review.reviewText: Nice location and safe, comfortable place to stay!

review.title: one time stay no plans on going back
review.reviewText: Bathroom door had no stop to keep it open if you wanted to

review.title: best airport hotel
review.reviewText: we stayed in this hotel for one night as we were getting the plane home the next day. excellent service and very clean hotel. we waited the next day for the free shuttle to the airport it was running late so one of the staff called us a taxi free of charge to make sure we weren't late.

review.title: Flying Out of SFO
review.reviewText: The hotel was more than adequate for our need to stay close to SFO. The shuttle was on time and helpful with our luggage. The queen size beds were comfortable and was an extra bonus since most of the other hotels in the area only offered double beds for the same price. For the price we would surely stay again when flying out of SFO.

review.title: Definately good
review.reviewText: if you have a car or rent a car, don't spend your extra $40 for parking per a night at SF downtown hotels. this is a really comfortable and clean hotel. location is quite good and prking is free. Free continental breakfast is a bonus. we(wife and I and two sons) had a great stay here

review.title: loved it will stay again
review.reviewText: great very comfy beds clean great breakfast

review.title: Comfortable and Convenient
review.reviewText: Good value for money. Close to airport and an excellent restaurant.

review.title: Great stay
review.reviewText: I found the staff to be extrememly helpful and courteous. My room was very clean and the continental breakfast was better than many others that I have had.

review.title: Hampton reliable choice
review.reviewText: We usually stay at a Hampton Inn if possible. We know there will be a clean room and a good breakfast. This Inn is a cut above other Hamptons. Very convenient to SFO - shuttle came promptly.

review.title: Very Good Choice
review.reviewText: We had requested a room not to far from the elevator and that is what we received. The room was very clean,had two chairs,desk,coffee maker, wireless and lodgenet. My only complaint was that the desk person never told me there was a side door that we could use to carry in our luggage. No map no instructions about breakfast or where to park just a key and a number. I heard maybe two planes and other wise it was quiet. Breakfast had may choices and all were fresh and good.

review.title: Disappointed
review.reviewText: This is a bolt hole if you need a cheap place to crash near the airport. The jet noise is loud and the room ventilation system is old so it makes a loud noise all night as well. Breakfast is a dismal affair.

review.title: good hub to the SFO Airport
review.reviewText: good price for quality; shuttles from an to airport; all wel on time (as was the wake-up call).

review.title: good stay
review.reviewText: Good stay, means everything was ok.

review.title: Great location and GREAT service
review.reviewText: By far the ost enjoyable stay in a LONG time. The service was always top notch. The staff and condition of the hotel could not be topped in it's class. It is close to the airport and major roads to get around and the price was in range for being in the area.

review.title: Good value
review.reviewText: Clean, convenient and courteous service.

review.title: nice hotel by the airport
review.reviewText: Beds were soft and we were far enough away from the airport that we couldn't hear it.

review.title: Would stay there again
review.reviewText: The hotel was clean and the staff helpful. It was in a good location and easy to access the airport. It is not the Fairmont but did not pay Fairmont rates.

review.title: Close to SFO and nice for the price
review.reviewText: Newer construction with large bathroom and room to put things. The complimentary breakfast is better than most.

review.title: Comfortable and convenient to airport
review.reviewText: We stayed at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Burlingame because we had an overnight layover in San Francisco. The hotel has a courtesy shuttle to and from the airport that runs every half hour. The room was clean and quiet enough, and the complimentary breakfast buffet was great. We enjoyed our stay and would recommend this hotel.

review.title: Clean Airport Hotel
review.reviewText: Good clean airport hotel. Friendly and welcoming staff. Great hotel for an overnight stop.

review.title: Very friendly staff worked with us each of the three different nights we stayed. Wonderful!
review.reviewText: My husband and I were in the hotel for three different nights: overnight before we flew to Maui, overnight before we traveled to the CA wine country and overnight before our flight back to NC. The staff was wonderful! Their breakfast was extremely tasty with great variety. The BEDS were absolutely the most comfortable we had slept in away from home. I would recommend this hotel to anyone. It is also close to some reasonably priced restaurants, has a shuttle to and from the airport and is across from the water. In addition the room was very quiet...almost unheard of in a mid-range cost hotel.

review.title: Watched Super Bowl
review.reviewText: Get HD TV's

review.title: Two bulbs were off
review.reviewText: Two bulbs in the room were off. I called the front and the Maintenance came into the room to fix them in a few minutes.

review.title: Very close to San Francisco Airport
review.reviewText: Super hotel & great breakfast.

review.title: Great Hotel
review.reviewText: Very impressed with this hotel for the price. Room was well equipped with fridge, coffee maker, iron and internet connection. Bed was very comfortable and the room was reasonably quiet considering how close it's located to the airport. Staff was helpful and courteous and the morning breakfast that comes with the room was fabulous. Free newpaper was also a nice touch. Highly recommended.

review.title: Great place to stay.
review.reviewText: Restaurants in the vacinity .Breakfast alone is available in the Hampton Inn and Suites but I might add a great breakfast is provided.

review.title: Fine and quiet
review.reviewText: The hotel was just fine and quite quiet for being so close to the airport.

review.title: Clean and Spacious
review.reviewText: We really enjoyed staying here. The King Suite was spacious and very affordable. Everything was exceptionally clean. The breakfast the following morning was plentiful, fresh and delicious. This place is a GREAT bargain.

review.title: Convenient to airport
review.reviewText: A quick shuttle ride from the airport, many resaurants within walking distance, 1/2 block to 3 blocks.

review.title: Location not suitable for short term visitor to Denver
review.reviewText: overall quite acceptable, friendly service

review.title: Conveniently close to airport
review.reviewText: This hotel is well managed, clean, comfortable, and perfect for early flights out of San Francisco.

review.title: Recommand to stay in San Francisco Airport
review.reviewText: Condition/cleanliness/Room comfort is very satisfied,including breakfast.However,the luggage lease room is very small and front desk sometimes will refuse you;the shuttle bus to airport is very short,you maybe wait for long time.

review.title: Expectations Met
review.reviewText: Solid Hampton experience - great if you want to be near the airport

review.title: Very fine place to stay
review.reviewText: We always stay here when we have a plane to catch at SFO...The rooms are always clean and very comfortable. You even get a choice of soft or hard bed pillows! The complimentary breakfast served in the hotel lobby is quite adequate. The hotel also offers free shuttle service to and from the airport every half hour beginning at 4:05 a.m.

review.title: Close to airport and resturants
review.reviewText: Clean relatively new Hampton Inn. Large Breakfast area.

review.title: A pleasant stay.
review.reviewText: We were very pleased with the friendliness of the hotel staff. We found our room very neat and well stocked each day. The "buffet breakfast" that was included in the room rate was your typical continental breakfast including a nice variety of cereals, fruits, bread items and also 2 hot items each day. Everyone in the family agreed that it was a very nice variety.

review.title: Clean, quite, easy access to SFO
review.reviewText: Needed a hotel to stay prior to an early morning flight. Hotel staff were courteous and helpful in planning hotel shuttle transportation (4:05 a.m.). Clean, quite and less than 10 minutes from SFO. Highly recommend.

review.title: Good for a stopover
review.reviewText: This was a very clean and comfortable hotel, ideal for a stopover. Well situated for the airport, with good shuttle service. Staff were friendly and courteous. Breakfast was quite basic, but was included in the price, so nothing to complain about.

review.title: Very quiet
review.reviewText: free shuttle to airport great.

review.title: Excellent hotel for location and cost!
review.reviewText: Excellent location, clean, personable, wonderful breakfast!

review.title: Convenient
review.reviewText: Cheap and cheerful - and as close to the airport as you can get.

review.title: Very Convenient - has what SF doesn't offer, and affordable too
review.reviewText: Stayed here our 2nd time and brought a guest family with us. The French Toast and sausage at the breakfast bar was a treat. Highly recommend this place if you want comfortable beds and hospitality for a better price.

review.title: Good place to stay
review.reviewText: Was just an overnight stay close to airport. Hotel was very cleen nice continental breakfast served early. Good service to airport.

review.title: Very comfortable and convenient
review.reviewText: Did not hear aircraft noise with San Francisco airport close by. Very nice location by the bay.

review.title: sept 2006
review.reviewText: Could'nt find anything bad to say about this hotel,fulfilled all expectations but when getting off highway 101 get off at millbrae exit. Had places to eat within walking distance , we went to the elephant grill and even at 10.00 at night it was still all happening. Only wish some of the other places we had stayed in were as good

review.title: New & Clean
review.reviewText: This Hampton Inn is very close and convenient to SFO and we enjoyed it's excellent condition. The hotel was either new or newly remodeled and the rooms were well appointed. The clerks seemed at little overwhelmed but they got the job done. Their shuttle service was slow. Plan to leave earlier to compensate for this.

review.title: Layover in SF
review.reviewText: Clean and comfortable- and the price is right. I'd stay there again.

review.title: remarkably quiet for so close to airport
review.reviewText: We were in a room next to the elevator and its about a mile and a half to the airport. I cannot believe how quiet it is. Never heard a plane and never heard the elevator. One drawback, no restaurant or bar on premises. Hot breakfast in morning plus, no pool either (not that we would have used it) I would have preferred to stay in the city for sightseeing, but driving was easy once I got oriented with north, south, east and west. would go back.

review.title: Satisfactory
review.reviewText: It's conveniently located to the SF airport, and has a complimentary airport shuttle. It's like most all Hampton Inns, which is to say satisfactory, but not memorable.

review.title: Very impressed....would recommend it to mom
review.reviewText: Hotel was very clean, desk manager was very helpful in arranging all are needs, such as traveling on Bart, using their shuttle to SFO to catch Bart into the city, will return soon.

review.title: Conveniently located by San Francisco
review.reviewText: This hotel is ideal if you are visiting San Francisco with your family. For the price, its superior to what you can get downtown S.F. in quality and with double queen beds is a plus. The free breakfast, with more to offer than the usueal continental breakfast, open until 10:30 will stretch your budget.

review.title: Great hotel
review.reviewText: The Hampton is close to the airport, yet nice and quite. It's clean and a beautiful hotel. I would certainly stay here again.

review.title: it was great!
review.reviewText: I'm from korea. i stayed on one night,but room was very clean and very comfortable. Above all, bed was so comfortable, so I wanted to take the bed to my house! Breakfast was good, either!

review.title: Not impressed
review.reviewText: For the price, the hotel was not very impressive. However the service and complimentary breakfast was very good.

review.title: Clean and convenient
review.reviewText: Nice clean place to stay. Close to SFO but the room was very quiet. No noise from the road or airport. Lots of places to eat close by.

review.title: Good Value
review.reviewText: Good value for the money if you want to be close to the airport. Not much to do close by though.

review.title: Very Clean
review.reviewText: Close to SF Airport and nice area restaurants. Clean rooms and lobby. I will be ready to go back when I visit SF area.

review.title: Very clean, good service
review.reviewText: Very nice front desk staff allowed us to check in early since they had a room ready, room was very clean and in excellent condition. When we asked the front desk staff later that evening for a restaurant recommendation, not only did they give one but printed out directions to get there. Free breakfast ok, not anything grand but good - had fresh fruit, yogurt, eggs, meat, breads, muffins, danish, instant oatmeal, variety of spreads, juices, coffee, hot chocolate..you get the picture. We will definately stay here again.

review.title: Great experience
review.reviewText: Great hotel. Clean, well maintained, very good breakfast selections.

review.title: Great hotel for the price!
review.reviewText: Hotel staff was courteous and nice! Rooms were clean and comfortable! However, there was a power outage one day with no hot water.

review.title: van service to the airport
review.reviewText: their van service to and from the airport is terrible. if this is important to you then find another place to stay ! it is shared with several other hotels. we had to wait 45min. to get picked up when other hotel vans were going by every 10--15 min.

review.title: Nice Hotel and friendly staff
review.reviewText: The gentleman from Egypt who takes care of the breakfast area on the weekdays and on Sat was very nice,friendly, and went out of his way to make sure that everything was up to par. My only complaint was on the first night when the drain on the shower did not work well and they fixed it the next day. Very helpful in getting around SF and also the neighborhood restaurants. The recommended a fab Italian in the Burlingame area that was knock your socks off. IL Forinos was the name I think.

review.title: Close to airport
review.reviewText: Central location close to airport - basic but convenient and price friendly

review.title: Will return
review.reviewText: Room, towels and bed linen were clean. Cleaning staff did a good job. Closet had nice regular wooden hangers. Conveniently located close to SFO and across the street from the water. So it was nice to take a walk along the water. Benches located along the walkway so you could watch the airplanes take off and land. In addition, close to 101 access. For those who enjoy In-n-Out, a new one just opened only a couple of minutes away on the other side of 101. Although recently opened in 2003, noticed some damaged and missing tiles near base of coffee island in dining are. Bathroom door in my room was not hung correctly. In order to close the door, had to use force. Front desk was friendly. Greeted with a smile. Though one night, staff did not answer phone promptly; took almost 5 minutes for someone to answer the phone. Overall, the negative items above are minor, so I would return to this hotel. If you're not looking for full concierge and dining service, this is a good place to stay.
